name: Maneuver Strategy
description:
Pre-release version: more AI options to come. Currently best as local hot-seat multiplayer.

A new turn based strategy game with simple rules that have complicated consequences. Plan carefully to out maneuver your opponents. Eliminate their pieces without losing too many of your own. Attack their base to eliminate them in a single blow, but don’t leave yourself vulnerable.

  • Quick and simple to play harder to master.
  • 2, 3, and 4 player variants.
  • Full of hard choices.
